db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: TextArea is a multi-line text editor. TextArea extends TextEdit with a placeholder text functionality, and adds decoration.

TextArea is not scrollable by itself. Especially on screen-size constrained platforms, it is often preferable to make entire application pages scrollable. On such a scrollable page, a non-scrollable TextArea might behave better than nested scrollable controls. Notice, however, that in such a scenario, the background decoration of the TextArea scrolls together with the rest of the scrollable content.

db:section.db:title: Scrollable TextArea
db:section.db:para: If you want to make a TextArea scrollable, for example, when it covers an entire application page, it can be placed inside a ScrollView.

db:section.db:title: Tab Focus
db:section.db:para: By default, pressing the tab key while TextArea has active focus results in a tab character being input into the control itself. To make tab pass active focus onto another item, use the attached KeyNavigation properties:

db:section.db:title: background : Item
db:section.db:para: This property holds the background item.

db:note.db:para: If the background item has no explicit size specified, it automatically follows the control's size. In most cases, there is no need to specify width or height for a background item.

Most controls use the implicit size of the background item to calculate the implicit size of the control itself. If you replace the background item with a custom one, you should also consider providing a sensible implicit size for it (unless it is an item like Image which has its own implicit size).

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12)] bottomInset : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the bottom inset for the background.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: focusReason : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property holds the reason of the last focus change.

db:note.db:para: This property does not indicate whether the item has active focus, but the reason why the item either gained or lost focus.

db:td.db:para: A Backtab occurred. The input for this may include the Shift or Control keys; e.g. Shift+Tab.
The window system made this window either active or inactive.
The application opened/closed a pop-up that grabbed/released the keyboard focus.
The user typed a label's buddy shortcut

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8)] hoverEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines whether the text area accepts hover events. The default value is true.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8).

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8)] hovered : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the text area is hovered.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8).

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12)] implicitBackgroundHeight : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the implicit background height.
The value is equal to background ? background.implicitHeight : 0.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12)] implicitBackgroundWidth : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the implicit background width.
The value is equal to background ? background.implicitWidth : 0.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12)] leftInset : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the left inset for the background.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: placeholderText : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the short hint that is displayed in the text area before the user enters a value.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12)] placeholderTextColor : color
db:section.db:para: This property holds the color of placeholderText.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12)] rightInset : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the right inset for the background.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12)] topInset : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the top inset for the background.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:title: TextArea.flickable : TextArea
db:section.db:para: This property attaches a text area to a Flickable.

db:section.db:title: pressAndHold(MouseEvent event)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when there is a long press (the delay depends on the platform plugin). The event parameter provides information about the press, including the x and y coordinates of the press, and which button is pressed.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8)] pressed(MouseEvent event)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the text area is pressed by the user. The event parameter provides information about the press, including the x and y coordinates of the press, and which button is pressed.
This signal was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8).

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8)] released(MouseEvent event)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the text area is released by the user. The event parameter provides information about the release, including the x and y coordinates of the press, and which button is pressed.
This signal was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.1 (Qt 5.8).
